name: Willy's Inn
description:
This was a game made for the Bored Pixel Jam 8 and the theme was You Are Not the Hero.

We all hear stories about Heroes.

These Heroes are Wizards, Rogues and Warriors who spend their lives hunting wild beasts, fighting evil and protecting the citizens. But who feeds and provides equipment to those same  Heroes? You do! Willy , a 32 year old guy, who  just opened an Inn in the center of the most dangerous village. long abandoned by his peers. His job is to feed and equip any Hero who passes through your Inn so he goes prepared to fight the evildoers  (and to earn some cash so we can survive).
